content.text:
# V (The Fucking Champs album)

[ link]
| rev2 = Pitchfork Media
| rev2Score = 8.1/10 [http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/3238-v/ link] July 24, 2002
| rev3 = Stylus Magazine
| rev3Score = Bâˆ’ [http://www.stylusmagazine.com/reviews/the-fucking-champs/v.htm link] September 9, 2003
| noprose = yes
}}
V is the fifth full-length album by San Francisco metal/indie group The Fucking Champs, released in 2002 on Drag City.
Track listing
#Never Enough Neck Pt. 1
#Never Enough Neck Pt. 2
#Children Perceive the Hoax Cluster
#I Am Tte Album Cover
#Nebula Ball Rests in a Fantasy Claw
#The Virtues of Cruising
#Aliens of Gold
#Air on a G-String
#Hats Off to Music
#Major Airbro's Landing
#Policenauts 2000
#Crummy Lovers Die in the Grave
#Part Three
#Happy Segovia
#Chorale Motherfucker
